title: App crashes after staying in a chat screen for some time (can be reproduced on a slow iPad Mini, iOS 9.3.5)
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: The app crashes after staying in a chat screen for couple of minutes. Happens for both 1-1 chat and group chat. 
I think it maybe related to a slow device I'm testing on - iPad Mini ([iPad2,5](https://everymac.com/ultimate-mac-lookup/?search_keywords=iPad2,5)), iOS 9.3.5. I could not reproduce it on my 2nd device - iPhone 6, iOS 11.2.1. Anyway, I think it's worth investigating the attached crash logs to understand the root cause.

#### Expected behavior
App should not crash in the chat screen.

#### Actual behavior
App crashes in the chat screen after couple of minutes.

### Reproduction

- Use a slow device with an old iOS version. Ideally the same device that is mentioned here
- Open Status
- Go to a 1-1 chat or a group chat and stay there for about 5 minutes

### Additional Information
* Status version: 0.9.12 (TestFlight)
* Operating System: iOS 9.3.5
* Device: iPad Mini ([iPad2,5](https://everymac.com/ultimate-mac-lookup/?search_keywords=iPad2,5))
* Can reproduce 7/8 times
* Works on iPhone 6, iOS 11.2.1
* Maybe related to https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/2938
